settings.title: It's time to reset & rejuvenate, together!
settings.subheading: Start Your New, Healthy Habits with ProLon, a Health Coach, and a Fasting Group! With your purchase of ProLon, you automatically get a health coach at no extra cost who will prep and coach you as you complete the 5-day ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet in a fasting group.

settings.title: Order now, then select your dates and register below.

settings.text: If you already have your ProLon kit, simply select your dates and register.

settings.subtitle: KRISTIN KIRKPATRICK, MS, RDN
settings.title: Saturday, April 8 – Saturday, April 15
settings.text: Cleveland-based celebrity dietitian Kristin is a well-known and respected coach, best-selling author, and works at the prestigious Cleveland Clinic. She’s had many TV appearances, including on The Today Show and the Dr. Oz show. Her ProLon fasting groups have been overwhelmingly popular.

settings.subtitle: CYNTHIA SASS
settings.title: Sunday, April 23 – Saturday, April 29
settings.text: Cynthia Sass, our first brand ambassador, is a three-time New York Times best-selling author and well-known dietitian. She’s been a nutrition consultant for five professional sports teams and has consulted Oscar, Grammy, and Emmy winners. She’s appeared on The Today Show, Good Morning America, The Doctors, and many others.

settings.subtitle: Audrey Zona
settings.title: Sunday, March 26 – Saturday, April 1
settings.text: Audrey is one of the country’s most well-known health coaches and speakers. Trained at the world’s leading school in nutritional psychology, she specializes in leading weight loss groups. She’ll prep and coach you as you complete the 5-day ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet, the revolutionary program of tasty, specially-designed food that mimics a fast.

settings.code: Doing ProLon in a group setting will not only be more fun, but it will better motivate you to make your new, healthy habits last long into the future.

settings.title: Daily Guidance
settings.text: Daily guidance and tips on how to do ProLon & what your body is going through.

settings.title: Live Chat
settings.text: Live chat with your coach and fellow fasters throughout the day.

settings.title: Daily Zoom Events
settings.text: Coach led daily Zoom video events, with live Q&A. Access to daily recordings.

settings.title: Healthy Eating
settings.text: Post-ProLon healthy eating advice for day six and beyond.

settings.title: ProLon 5-Day
settings.custom_name:
5-Day Fasting Kit

MOST POPULAR
settings.custom_description: Cellular Rejuvenation, Healthy Aging & Longevity and Metabolic Health Protocol: 3 times per year
settings.product_description: Everything you need for your 5-day fast with food. ProLon is designed and clinically tested by 14 global universities to nourish your body with premium quality plant-based food, while inducing the cellular, metabolic, and emotional benefits of prolonged fasting.

settings.title: ProLon 3-Day Reset
settings.custom_name:
Three 1-Day Fasting Kits

From $99
settings.custom_description: Healthy lifestyle, Gut Health, Weight Balance Protocol: 3 times per month
settings.product_description: ProLon Reset provides you a day of innovative nutrition formula that was scientifically tested and patented to feed your body while keeping it in a physiological fasting state. This Nutrition Program induces your body to breakdown fat and use it as fuel, similar to what happens when you water fast.

settings.title: ProLon 3-Day Reset
settings.custom_description: Reset: Black Bean, Tomato, Vegetable, Butternut Squash

settings.title: New Flavors
